ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Powerlevelling
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know that this will work for a cleric. (but i will be finding out soon. :) Me . lvl 28 bard and a lvl 21 druid took a lvl 12 warrior to the raider camp
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know that this will work for a cleric. (but i
will be finding out soon. :)
Me . lvl 28 bard and a lvl 21 druid took a lvl 12
warrior to the raider camp in s karana (just south of
the stone bridge) In right around two hours we got 7
bubbles of xp for him. (we quit then because the goal
was one bubble into 14, to match the rest of the
group). The camp should be good I think about lvl 9
or 10 to 15. I would lullaby the camp and he would
pick one (casters first) and whack it. The druid was
for invigor(lvl 9 clr spell) cast regularly and
healing which was rarely needed(troll warrior). A
cleric could do for this for themselves but would
then require stops for mana regen. Sometimes id be
ambitious and pull singles, but mostly I just counted
on lullaby and twisted in healing every once in a
while.

--- "Daniel P. Sniderman"
<fuzzbone@...> wrote:
> Our smallish guild lost our only 30+ Cleric
> recently - and the low 20's
> guy doesn't play much - so we are discussing trying
> to powerlevel a couple
> to fill the need.
>
> Any suggestions on strategies for a 40 Bard to
> aid in such a dubious
> task.
>
> Thanks
>
> Slyde
>
